about_the_game:
Description

Vigilant Inquest is a movement shooter where you play as a detective that got fired from their job because one case that was dropped just didn't sit right with you, so you go out on your own to find out the truth about the abandoned factory.

Throughout your journey in the factory you will find: Weapon upgrades, secret areas to hone your skills, and plenty of places to move around with incredible speed.
But most importantly, the secret of what's hidden inside this factory.

Features

Weapon upgrades:
There is a weapon upgrade system, after you play levels you collect points you can use to upgrade weapons to help you through the levels and add more movement options to your arsenal.

Leaderboards:
Every level and secret level has a leaderboard! Can you be the one at the top?
Go as fast as you can by showing you mastered the movement mechanics and dominate the competition.

Movement:
You have a lot of movement options at your disposal, you start out with walking, running, sliding, double-jumping and wall-running.
You can unlock more movement options by upgrading your weapons such as a Grappling hook, a Dash, Rocket Jumping and much more!

Accessibility:
To make this game more accessible, it has a menu to change any color you need, such as menu text, ammo text color, ammo display color and much more,.
This game also has key binding options, sso you can bind any action to any key to be comfortable for you.
This game also has controller support if that is more your style! But keyboard will be recommended.
